divs: Sighting Details I'd like to warn you before you view the video, it can be disturbing. You can see 2 images in each circular shape moving, bending, and turning. On Nov. 2, 2010 at 10:14 p.m. this video was captured in the night sky of Lake Havasu City, AZ. It is truly amazing! I did lighten the beggining of the clips for better viewing. Because, this is the area where you can see 2 BEINGS in each circular shape.
Object Shape: Circle, Flash, Oval, Sphere, Triangle, Other, Unknown
trends: There have been 30 other sightings in Lake Havasu City
There were no other sightings in Lake Havasu City on or around November 2nd 2010
This sighting has never been favorited.
